about_the_game:
This DLC contains all previously released DLC for this game. Do not buy it, if you have some of this DLC::
Simple Story Alex - Two Guys
Simple Story Alex - Good Day
Find Exit (Simple Story - Alex DLC)
Simple Story Alex - Wife Art

Simple Story Alex - Two Guys
This DLC will tell you the story of of two minor characters from the main game, and how they appeared on the deserted and snowy islands.
This little sketch you will be able to see, after installing DLC and loading the 15 save slot, in main game.

Simple Story Alex - Good Day
This DLC adds to the game additional episode with short story, which takes place long before the events of the original game.
We will be able to see the happy Alex who does not yet drink and has a loving and caring wife.
This little sketch you will be able to see, after installing DLC and loading the 16 save slot, in main game.

Find Exit (Simple Story - Alex DLC)
"Find Exit" - it is my first project. This game served as inspiration and prototype for my future work. In this game you will find not a single word, but instead it have 3 huge labyrinths in which you need to find the teleport. Your task is to help the Demon find a way out and return home to his astral world.
(DLC can be found in main game folder, and it needs to start manually). [/b]

Simple Story Alex - Wife Art:
DLC adds an image in PNG with the wife of the protagonist. It will be in base game folder, after installation.
Picture resolution: 1050x1400
